summary: this is a WIP of tthe cancelled DLC Redguard it takes you on a quest to the isle of stros M'Kai it has a starting quest that is almost finished and will have a pretty good sized Main Quest and with at least30-40 side quests and dungeons
descriptionHtml:
**Requires Dawnguard and DragonBorn DLC's**

***Update 2.6***

this is the project ill be working on the most from here on out
.screenshots and ideas that seem suitable redguard and islandy for quests and im even taking requests for 50 Npcs but only 25 of them will have quets attached so apply now

**Update Alpha 2.5**

-Added an npc hunter at the oasis
-added a new set of armor and a new weapon to the oasis
-added new dwarven enemies to the dwarven ruin extrior (working on interior
-added 2 new types of atronach encounter the volcanic golem and the stone golem to the wilderness



*Update alpha 2.0*

- added a new skin texture to the red dragon

-added some more Plants to the landscape and some sand textures to the coast



**Update Alpha 1.5**

-added navmesh (follower friendly)
-added a beginning quest


this mod need a lot of work so please let me know what you think i should add

so i got tired of the barely done lost mods and if your like me you were angry that bethesda stopped making dlc even with the unused data that hinted at a 3rd DLC *Redguard* so i decided i was going to make my own

have a Basic Layout of island of Stros M'kai (Thanks to Fariel for his stating setup but it is currently pretty barren and no npcs however i have the resources to finish but could use some help with quest making i made a basic quest to go find the Red Dragon Nahfahlaar as the boss. barely any enemies and or wildlife however i have a few towns but only a few interiors.

Has
-an island that is fully explorable
-a Red Dragon Boss Stronger than Alduin
-a couple Towns
-a market with custom stalls
- tropical foliage with some wildlife
-an Apothecary that is fully funtional at her stall in the market
-a working forge


things to add
-Dungeons
-enemies
-NPC's
-Quests
-Finsh Landscaping
-add Wildlife
-add some custom armor (hoping for permission from the makers of the redguard Armor Mod and the immersive armor and weapons mods)

If you Wish to assist me contact me and let me see some of you work
-Looking for helpers that could help me complete this by dungeon design and Quest Scripting
-Looking for armor Creators that would complement the Hammerfell Area
-Looking for Custom Creature Creators to make new meshes so that they would fit in this climate


Pics Coming Soon of What ive got So Far



Credits for the beginning layout go to Fariel who gave me permission to work on his his Stros mkai island mod
author: Elfendrago
